alert.note: Alert for Yakima Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 28 at 4:42PM PST until March 02 at 10:34PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pendleton OR has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Washington... Yakima River near Parker affecting Yakima Valley zone. For the Yakima River...including Parker...flooding is possible.
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pdt. WAZ027-010845- /O.NEW.KPDT.FL.A.0003.220302T1138Z-220303T0634Z/ /PARW1.0.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NO/ 442 PM PST Mon Feb 28 2022 ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT TO LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Yakima River near Parker. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night to late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, There will be minor flooding of pastures and farm roads adjacent to the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM PST Monday the stage was 4.0 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
